name: Safari Animal Sniper Hunting: Shooter Survival
name_original: Safari Animal Sniper Hunting: Shooter Survival
description:
Forest(Jungle) animal hunting and shooting are the new amazing game and to get new target shooting experience in safari jungle. which you might be able to get in your life. Hunt the animals in a unique way with fps Sniper Gun.the unsafe jungle is filled with animals i.e African buffalos, hyena, tiger, lion and much more.Be careful while hunting African buffalos, hyena, tiger and lion because they can attack you and take you in the mouth of death.
Jungle Animal Sniper Shooter game is filled with action, shooting and hunting the hilarious animals. When you heard the sound of the dangerous animals then you have to alert for shooting. You can play this game for the best target of your own ultimate hunting skill. This game now beat all other African jungle animal hunting games in 2017.

GAME FEATURES

- Realistic & Amazing Jungle Environment
- Amazing and Stunning graphics
- Multiple levels game. Each with a new challenge
- Best Sniper Hunting Game in Jungle of 2017
- Select different animals as targets for shooting
- Amazing FPS Gun Controls for perfect shooting
- Easy Game play for enjoying and entertainment
- Realistic Artificial Intelligence
- Ability to Aim and Zoom on the targeted animal
- Hyena, Tiger and Lion can attack player
- 6 Level of Each Animal in Day & Night

GAME PLAY

- Select the African animal from Buffalo, Hyena, Tiger and Loin
- Select the Environment in which you want to play the game
- Select the latest unlocked level for best adventure of hunting animals
- Set the aim by holding and moving finger on screen
- Press the zoom button for more precise and accurate view of animal
- Shoot down the animal by pressing on fire button
- Play the game for all animals in day and night for much fun
